title: Directory: add actionable retry control for school-load failures

requirements.summary: Add a Retry action to the Directory error banner that refetches the schools React Query without a full page refresh, while keeping the existing English error message unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When the Directory page is in an error state, it still displays exactly the message: "Failed to load schools. Please try again later."
The error UI includes a clearly labeled "Retry" action that triggers a React Query refetch for the schools query.
If the backend becomes available, clicking "Retry" loads and renders the schools grid without a full page reload.

file_operations.description: Update the Directory error state UI to include a clearly labeled "Retry" control that calls the React Query refetch function returned by useSchools(selectedHours). Ensure the existing error message string remains exactly unchanged and that retry does not require a full page reload. If using shadcn-ui (e.g., Button) for the control, verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
